pkgmetadata.longdescription: An R Interface to 'deck.gl' // Makes 'deck.gl' https://deck.gl/, a WebGL-powered open-source JavaScript framework for visual exploratory data analysis of large datasets, available within R via the 'htmlwidgets' package. Furthermore, it supports basemaps from 'mapbox' https://www.mapbox.com/ via 'mapbox-gl- js' https://github.com/mapbox/mapbox-gl-js.
